languages.text: "Что вы хотите от меня узнать, слуги трупа на троне? Имена моих собратьев? Сколько нас? Где мы? Я отвечу и так — нас тьма, и мы повсюду. Скоро, очень скоро, вы услышите наши голоса. И когда они зазвучат у вас за спиной, так близко, что вы ощутите наше дыхание — тогда вы узнаете мощь истинного бога!"

"What do you want to know, servants of the corpse emperor? The names of my brethren? How many of us there are? Where we are? I will tell you myself — we are myriad, and we are everywhere. Soon, very soon, you will hear our voices. And when you hear them at your back, so close you can feel our breath — then you will know the power of the true god!"
languages.original_text: "Что вы хотите от меня узнать, слуги трупа на троне? Имена моих собратьев? Сколько нас? Где мы? Я отвечу и так — нас тьма, и мы повсюду. Скоро, очень скоро, вы услышите наши голоса. И когда они зазвучат у вас за спиной, так близко, что вы ощутите наше дыхание — тогда вы узнаете мощь истинного бога!"

traits.locale_text: "What do you want to know, servants of the Corpse Emperor? The names of my brethren? How many of us there are? Where we are? I will tell you myself — we are myriad, and we are everywhere. Soon, very soon, you will hear our voices. And when they sound behind your backs, so close you can feel our breath — then you will know the power of the true god!"
traits.speaker: CultistLeaderSororitasQuest

traits.speaker: CultistLeaderSororitasQuest

languages.text: “你们想知道什么，尸皇的走狗？想知道我的兄弟们都有谁？想知道我们在哪？很好，我告诉你——我们无穷无尽，我们无处不在。很快，用不了多久，你就会听到我们的声音在你们背后响起，甚至可以感觉到我们的呼吸——到了那个时候，你们就会见识到真神的力量！”
languages.original_text: "What do you want to know, servants of the corpse emperor? The names of my brethren? How many of us there are? Where we are? I will tell you myself — we are myriad, and we are everywhere. Soon, very soon, you will hear our voices. And when you hear them at your back, so close you can feel our breath — then you will know the power of the true god!"

traits.locale_text: “你们想知道什么，尸皇的走狗？想知道我的兄弟们都有谁？想知道我们在哪？很好，我告诉你——我们无穷无尽，我们无处不在。很快，用不了多久，你就会听到我们的声音在你们背后响起，甚至可以感觉到我们的呼吸——到了那个时候，你们就会见识到真神的力量！”
traits.speaker: CultistLeaderSororitasQuest

languages.text: «¿Qué queréis saber, siervos del emperador cadáver? ¿Los nombres de mis hermanos? ¿Cuántos somos? ¿Dónde estamos? Os lo diré yo mismo. Somos legión y estamos por todas partes. Pronto, muy pronto, oiréis nuestras voces. Y cuando las oigáis a vuestras espaldas, tan cerca como para sentir nuestro aliento... ¡conoceréis el poder del dios verdadero!».
languages.original_text: "What do you want to know, servants of the corpse emperor? The names of my brethren? How many of us there are? Where we are? I will tell you myself — we are myriad, and we are everywhere. Soon, very soon, you will hear our voices. And when you hear them at your back, so close you can feel our breath — then you will know the power of the true god!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Qué queréis saber, siervos del emperador cadáver? ¿Los nombres de mis hermanos? ¿Cuántos somos? ¿Dónde estamos? Os lo diré yo mismo. Somos legión y estamos por todas partes. Pronto, muy pronto, oiréis nuestras voces. Y cuando las oigáis a vuestras espaldas, tan cerca como para sentir nuestro aliento... ¡conoceréis el poder del dios verdadero!».
traits.speaker: CultistLeaderSororitasQuest

languages.text: 「死体の皇帝のしもべたちよ、何が知りたいのだ？同胞の名前か？人数か？所在か？教えてやろう。我々は無数に存在し、どこにでもいる。もうすぐ、もうすぐ、われわれの声が聞こえてくるだろう。我々の息づかいを感じることができるほど近くで、声を聞くことができるようになるのだ…そして、お前たちは真なる神の力を知ることになるだろう！」
languages.original_text: "What do you want to know, servants of the corpse emperor? The names of my brethren? How many of us there are? Where we are? I will tell you myself — we are myriad, and we are everywhere. Soon, very soon, you will hear our voices. And when you hear them at your back, so close you can feel our breath — then you will know the power of the true god!"

traits.locale_text: 「死体の皇帝のしもべたちよ、何が知りたいのだ？同胞の名前か？人数か？所在か？教えてやろう。我々は無数に存在し、どこにでもいる。もうすぐ、もうすぐ、われわれの声が聞こえてくるだろう。我々の息づかいを感じることができるほど近くで、声を聞くことができるようになるのだ…そして、お前たちは真なる神の力を知ることになるだろう！」
traits.speaker: CultistLeaderSororitasQuest

languages.text: "Was wollt Ihr wissen, Diener des Leichenimperators? Die Namen meiner Brüder? Wie viele wir sind? Wo wir sind? Ich werde es Euch sagen – wir sind unzählig, und wir sind überall. Bald, schon sehr bald, werdet Ihr unsere Stimmen hören. Und wenn Ihr sie in Eurem Rücken hört, so nah, dass Ihr unseren Atem spürt – dann werdet Ihr die Macht des wahren Gottes kennen!"
languages.original_text: "What do you want to know, servants of the corpse emperor? The names of my brethren? How many of us there are? Where we are? I will tell you myself — we are myriad, and we are everywhere. Soon, very soon, you will hear our voices. And when you hear them at your back, so close you can feel our breath — then you will know the power of the true god!"

traits.locale_text: "Was wollt Ihr wissen, Diener des Leichenimperators? Die Namen meiner Brüder? Wie viele wir sind? Wo wir sind? Ich werde es Euch sagen – wir sind unzählig, und wir sind überall. Bald, schon sehr bald, werdet Ihr unsere Stimmen hören. Und wenn Ihr sie in Eurem Rücken hört, so nah, dass Ihr unseren Atem spürt – dann werdet Ihr die Macht des wahren Gottes kennen!"
traits.speaker: CultistLeaderSororitasQuest

languages.text: « Que voulez-vous savoir, serviteurs de l'Empereur-Cadavre ? Le nom de mes frères ? Où et combien nous sommes ? Je vais vous le dire de mon plein gré : nous sommes innombrables et partout. Bientôt, très bientôt, vous entendrez nos voix. Et lorsqu'elles retentiront dans votre dos, si proches que vous sentirez notre souffle sur votre nuque, vous connaîtrez alors le pouvoir du dieu véritable ! »
languages.original_text: "What do you want to know, servants of the corpse emperor? The names of my brethren? How many of us there are? Where we are? I will tell you myself — we are myriad, and we are everywhere. Soon, very soon, you will hear our voices. And when you hear them at your back, so close you can feel our breath — then you will know the power of the true god!"

traits.locale_text: « Que voulez-vous savoir, serviteurs de l'Empereur-Cadavre ? Le nom de mes frères ? Où et combien nous sommes ? Je vais vous le dire de mon plein gré : nous sommes innombrables et partout. Bientôt, très bientôt, vous entendrez nos voix. Et lorsqu'elles retentiront dans votre dos, si proches que vous sentirez notre souffle sur votre nuque, vous connaîtrez alors le pouvoir du dieu véritable ! »
traits.speaker: CultistLeaderSororitasQuest

languages.text: "Kadavra imparatorun hizmetkârları... Ne bilmek istiyorsunuz? Kardeşlerimin isimlerini mi? Kaç kişi olduğumuzu mu? Yoksa nereyi mesken tuttuğumuzu mu? Siz sormadan söyleyeyim: Sayamayacağınız kadar çokuz. Her yerdeyiz. Yakında... Çok yakında sesimizi işiteceksiniz. Nefesimizi ensenizde hissettiğiniz zaman... İşte o zaman, gerçek tanrının gücüne tanıklık edeceksiniz!"
languages.original_text: "What do you want to know, servants of the corpse emperor? The names of my brethren? How many of us there are? Where we are? I will tell you myself — we are myriad, and we are everywhere. Soon, very soon, you will hear our voices. And when you hear them at your back, so close you can feel our breath — then you will know the power of the true god!"

traits.locale_text: "Kadavra imparatorun hizmetkârları… Ne bilmek istiyorsunuz? Kardeşlerimin isimlerini mi? Kaç kişi olduğumuzu mu? Yoksa nereyi mesken tuttuğumuzu mu? Siz sormadan söyleyeyim: Sayımız rakamların çok ötesinde. Her yerdeyiz. Yakında… Çok yakında sesimizi işiteceksiniz. Nefesimizi ensenizde hissettiğiniz zaman… İşte o zaman, gerçek tanrının gücüne tanıklık edeceksiniz!"
traits.speaker: CultistLeaderSororitasQuest
